overview: Featuring the soothing musical sounds of RichArt, this therapeutic video will help harness your natural energy and foster health, healing, balance and a feeling of harmony. As you tap into Reiki -- a Japanese word symbolizing a universal life force -- a sense of wellness will permeate your body and soul like a luminous glow. Reiki stimulates and focuses this protean energy to promote your equilibrium and well-being.
title: Nature States - Reiki
